formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: An INDEX ERROR in AnchorVars[25] occurs with the following message:

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: When building up the v bitvector which contains the set of named variables. the line which removes the ⍺ and ⍵ variables from this list incorrectly enclosed the membership set, which results in no such variables being removed from the bitvector. Without this enclose, it works.
